member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.BicepLocationResolver
member.summary: An used for resolving line numbers from a compiled JSON template to the original Bicep template.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.BicepLocationResolver.#ctor(Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.TemplateContext)
member.summary: Create a new instance with the given .
member.param: The template context to map JSON paths against.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Utilities.BicepLocationResolver.ResolveLineNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Given a JSON path in an expanded JSON template from a compiled Bicep file, find the equivalent line number in the original Bicep template.
member.param: The path in the expanded template to find the line number of in the original template.
member.returns: The line number of the equivalent location in the original template, or 1 if it can't be determined.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.BicepProcessor.BicepTemplateProcessor
member.summary: Contains functionality to process Bicep templates.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.BicepProcessor.BicepTemplateProcessor.ConvertBicepToJson(System.String)
member.summary: Converts Bicep template into JSON template and returns it as a string and its source map
member.returns: The compiled template as a JSON string and its source map.
